data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick Los Angeles.
In Portland Los Angeles drive forward through Eduard Atuesta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 5, At Providence Park, Jordan Harvey has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match at Providence Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jeremy Ebobisse, who is down injured.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Los Angeles at Providence Park.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
In the minute 10, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Bradley Wright-Phillips of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 11, It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Jeremy Ebobisse for Portland is back on the field again.
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Los Angeles.
Portland's Diego Chara has been booked in Portland.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Felipe Mora (Portland) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 23, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 26, Attention is being given to Los Angelesâ€™s Eddie Segura and play has been suspended briefly.
Eryk Williamson (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Yimmi Chara (Portland) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 30, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Eddie Segura is back on the pitch.
In the minute 31, Allen Chapman signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in Portland.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Portland are in shooting range from this free kick.
Felipe Mora's header is off-target for Portland.
Allen Chapman awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
In the minute 35, In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 37, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Felipe Mora (Portland) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Los Angeles defenders.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
Portland's Felipe Mora gets in a shot on goal at Providence Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Felipe Mora (Portland) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 41, Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In the minute 43, Diego Valeri for Portland drives towards goal at Providence Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
At Providence Park, Los Angeles are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 45, In Portland, Portland push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Free kick Los Angeles.
Portland to take a throw-in in Los Angeles territory.
The first half has been concluded at Providence Park.
In the minute 46, Allen Chapman has blown to start the second-half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jeremy Ebobisse.
In the minute 47, Felipe Mora instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Eddie Segura (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
In the minute 50, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
In Portland, Diego Valeri of Portland is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Allen Chapman signals a Portland throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
In the minute 51, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 57, Portland's Larrys Mabiala attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Portland.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Adrien Perez with Kwadwo Opoku.
Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
Danny Musovski gets his shot on target but fails to score for Los Angeles.
In the minute 61, Los Angeles's Kwadwo Opoku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Portland have a goal kick.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
In the minute 65, Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portland are whistled for offside.
In Portland Los Angeles drive forward through Francisco Ginella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 67, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Portland's Felipe Mora goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Portland.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Portland's area.
Portland advance rapidly upfield but Allen Chapman blows for offside.
In the minute 74, Francisco Ginella for Los Angeles gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's first substitution at Providence Park with Marco Farfan replacing Chris Duvall.
In the minute 75, Dejan Jakovic is replacing Jordan Harvey for Los Angeles at Providence Park.
Portland make their second substitution with Cristhian Paredes replacing Diego Valeri.
The away team have replaced Bryce Duke with Erik Duenas. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
In the minute 75, Christian Torres is on a sub for Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Portland.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Portland.
In the minute 77, Dejan Jakovic is booked for the away team.
Portland are pushing forward but Eryk Williamson's finish is wide of the goal.
Los Angeles have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Portland push upfield but Allen Chapman quickly pulls them for offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Dario Zuparic.
Dario Zuparic is back on his feet again.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Portland at Providence Park.
Allen Chapman signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Portland's half.
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 84, Portland pushes forward through Yimmi Chara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Dejan Jakovic (Los Angeles) gets in a strike â€“ but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Jaroslaw Niezgoda replacing Jeremy Ebobisse.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Eddie Segura of Los Angeles gets in a strike, but is off target.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
Allen Chapman will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Portland have a goal kick.
Allen Chapman awards Portland a goal kick.
Goal kick for Los Angeles at Providence Park.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Bill Tuiloma is replacing Felipe Mora for the home team.
Christian Torres is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Kwadwo Opoku for Los Angeles has been booked by Allen Chapman and receives a first yellow card.
